Articles.Content: So essentially when you’re in orbit and you want to dock you can switch ships and set target to the ships docking ports to make life 10x easier. On console though I can find the control to switch ships even though I have the right Kerbals in the right pods for this to work. Anybody know the control?
Not sure what control set you are using but (iirc havent been on ksp for a while)on Xbox Cursor controls it's hold LB+ right or left on the Dpad.
